rules.description: Enable copy-paste on ctrl (shift-ctrl in the terminal)
Mac OSX: disable cmd + option + h + m to prevent minimising all windows
Linux-style Ctrl+T/Shift+T (New Tab/Reopen Tab) - except kitty
Linux-style Ctrl+/ (Comment in IDEs) - except kitty
Disable Cmd+Tab (App Switcher) - AeroSpace handles window management
